name: Diamonds Collector
description:
The pursuit of wealth - How it feels?
Today, we offer you a more special mission than usual.Some diamonds have been lost in the city and there is no one to "take" them unnoticed. We won't call you a diamond thief until you get caught. Are you ready to take such risks?If so, get behind the wheel of a powerful car that will help you do your job in record time so as not to be noticed by anyone. Do you think you will cope?Be careful, leave no evidence!
Game features:
  • 3 levels
  • 8 different cars, according to preferences
  • Special Timer
